name: Maze 0x72
description:
Game I made for practicing purpose. Very simple, the idea is to find the key that opens the door by exploring the maze. It has 5 possible locations for key spawning, once you got the key, just go to the door to exit the maze.

Special thanks to 0x72 for the assets.

Github repo link: https://github.com/LucasBremm/Maze0x72
